name: ExtendRenewalDateRequest
desc: The request body containing subscription-renewal-extension data.

items.name: extendByDays
items.desc: Required. The number of days to extend the subscription renewal date. The maximum value is 90 days.

items.name: extendReasonCode
items.desc: Required. The reason code for the subscription date extension.

items.name: requestIdentifier
items.desc: Required. A string that contains a value you provide to uniquely identify this renewal-date-extension request. The maximum length of the string is 128 characters.
